item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-07-16
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Upgraded a blog to 2.8.1 and got the following error "Call to undefined method WP_Scripts" this post fixed it - #
  • Don't you love seeing this type of comment in someone else's code "this should never be the case, but unfortunately it happens". #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
